channel.title: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?
channel.description:
In pictures and walkthroughs I've seen of BM, the HUD looks very digital. In my game, it's just bland and weird looking.
My HUD ![](upload://2GlbzTDaRoEZi1gZdkAnO5VdPrz.jpeg)
Somebody else's HUD ![](upload://1yKg7Hfo9gIUHl8iroZCrEe0AxX.jpeg)
It's probably my old hag of a computer, but how can I fix this?
Specs
CPU: Intel Pentium D CPU 2.80GHz (2 CPUs)
Graphics: ATi Radeon x1050
OS: Windows XP Pro SP3
3GB RAM
****EDIT****
I have solved this.

item.title: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
kitor:

With this CPU? 4850 is too fast for C2d e6xxx

Depends on res and what games you throw at it.
And unless OP is fine with getting a used card on craigslist, there really is no point in bringing up a 3 gen old model.

Read full topic
item.source: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?

item.title: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?
item.dc:creator: kitor
item.description:
johnyo:
  1. If you do get a new GPU, go with the 7750

With this CPU? 4850 is too fast for C2d e6xxx

Read full topic
item.source: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?

item.title: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?
item.dc:creator: M4TT
item.description:
Nik1895:

You have a weak graphics card and your power supply won’t be enough for a new one. Get at least a 450W power supply. About graphics card: I can recommend GeForce GTS 450 (produced by either Gigabyte or Palit) - it’s pretty cheap (about $100) and perfoms pretty decent in all modern games.

I was thinking about getting an NVIDIA GeForce 8400. I have enough power for that.

Read full topic
item.source: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?

item.title: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?
item.dc:creator: M4TT
item.description:
This isn’t close to a pocket calculator, thank you very much. It runs BM very well, I just wanted a better HUD.

Read full topic

item.title: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
1. Try fiddling with the CCC settings
  2. Try older drivers
  3. If you do get a new GPU, go with the 7750

item.title: HUD Looks different from other people's HUD?
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Are you using ENBseries or SoftTH or any other D3D9.dll file? The BM custom shader dll conflicts with those.
